creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
The names of the resource type samples (e.g. in samples.xml of the xhtml resource type
module) should have i18n.

A possible enhancement for the future could be the option to
provide a small image illustrating the looks of each sample.

Fixed in revision 615955 (only i18n, not the images - you might want to open an
enhancement bug for this).
creator: andreas@apache.org
